name: 3 Levels
description:
3 Levels

A small rage game to prove your skills. Just 3 levels. Which one do you think is the hardest?

Anyway, are you stubborn enough to succeed? On the other hand it has just 3 levels... But be careful with RAGE-O-METER!

Please, write your finish time and number of attempts in the comments. It's very interesting to know. Also I'll add to the description the nickname of the first person who will write the password from the game. Good luck!

The winner is Stikulzon

PS: this game was also written to prove that I can finish at least one game from the beginning to the end. Looks like I've done! Thank you for playing! I hope you enjoy it!

#staysafe
